review.title: A Probabilistic Analysis of Marker-Passing Techniques for Plan-Recognition
review.abstract: Useless paths are a chronic problem for marker-passing techniques. We use a probabilistic analysis to justify a method for quickly identifying and rejecting useless paths. Using the same analysis, we identify key conditions and assumptions necessary for marker-passing to perform well.
